sentences.english: If you'd just sign the register.
sentences.chinese: 每个职员必须在工作时间记录簿上签名。

sentences.english: Azar, who learned the trick years ago from another clerk.
sentences.chinese: 他几年前从另一个职员那学来了这一招。

sentences.english: Communicate with orphanage directors and hospital staff.
sentences.chinese: 与儿童福利院院长及医院职员联络。

sentences.english: Broken glass and pipettes are "sharps". Dispose of them correctly too.
sentences.chinese: 弃置大件玻璃利器时，请通知当值职员协助妥善处理。

sentences.english: Every one of the staff must sign the time-book.
sentences.chinese: 每个职员必须在工作时间记录簿上签名。

sentences.english: The letter added that counselling had been arranged for pupils and staff.
sentences.chinese: 信中说，已为学生和教职员工安排了心理咨询。

sentences.english: On behalf of the staff at Canada Weifang Secondary School (CWSS), we would like to welcome you.
sentences.chinese: 代表中加班的教职员工，我们对您表示衷心地欢迎。
这职员是计时算工资的。

sentences.english: Nor the logistics of having staff support a distributed PC estate.
sentences.chinese: 亦不后勤学有职员支持一个分布的个人计算机庄园。

sentences.english: He was led to the exclusive counter by the staff of the shop.
sentences.chinese: 他被商店的职员领到了专门出售高档商品的柜台。

sentences.english: The full cast will be announced next year and filming will begin in the spring.
sentences.chinese: 全体演职员表将于明年公布，并在春天开拍。

sentences.english: Did you meet Phil , the new employee in our office?
sentences.chinese: 你见过我们办公室的新职员菲尔吗？

sentences.english: The manager's suggestion to freeze salary raises catcalls among the staff.
sentences.chinese: 经理冻结薪金的建议引起职员的反对声音。

sentences.english: He spoke on behalf of all the members of the faculty and staff.
sentences.chinese: 他代表全体教职员工讲了话。

sentences.english: Workers in the company are being pensioned off at 50.
sentences.chinese: 该公司职员50岁时领养老金退休。

sentences.english: Holly Chan is a member of Oxfam's Archipelagic Southeast Asia team.
sentences.chinese: 陈一舫为乐施会东亚项目组职员。

definition: section chief (of an administrative unit)/head (of a department)
to ensure public security/to ensure safety (for workers engaged in production)/public security/security guard
assistant manager (in a large enterprise) (Tw)/(literary) to assist
